summary: This document is an email correspondence between Lisa D. Hurd and Amanda Kirby regarding mutual funds and their posting. It indicates internal communication within Deutsche Bank concerning financial operations.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D. Hurd is involved in the operations of Deutsche Bank, specifically in relation to mutual funds and their posting.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is communicating with Lisa D. Hurd about the status of mutual fund positions.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 21, 2013.
Lisa D. Hurd is requesting mutual funds to be manually posted.
Amanda Kirby is following up on the status of two positions related to Southern Financial.
